tea.name: Earl Gray
tea.taste: This British Tea is typically a black tea base flavored with oil from the rind of bergamost orange. Typically has a citrus or floral infused taste
tea.benefits: Boosts energy, improves immunity, and boosts metabolism

tea.name: English Breakfast Tea
tea.taste: Flavor is stronger and more robust than that of green tea. It's rich flavor may be slightly sweet, bitter, or malty. Best paired with milk and sugar.
tea.benefits: Many vitamins and minerals such as potassium,maganese, and Vitamin E. In addition it has a significant amount of thenanine, an amino acid that may help the drinker to relax.

tea.name: Irish Breakfast Tea
tea.taste: Made from Assam, a black tea grown in India, this tea is known for its strong malty flavor. Unlike it's English counterpart, Irish Breakfast Teas tends to be more robust, more finely ground, and have a higher proportion of Indian black tea leaves.
tea.benefits: Black teas such as these aid in digestion, reduce bloating, and sooth upset stomachs.

tea.name: Russian Caravan Tea
tea.taste: Famous for its rich and smoky flavor, this tea is an acquired taste
tea.benefits: High in antioxidants, heart health, reduces inflammation, and soothes headaches

tea.name: Indian Chai
tea.taste: Often a sweet, fragrant concoation of black tea, milk, and spices that originate from India
tea.benefits: Antioxidants, heart health, digestion, good for skin

tea.name: Oolong Tea
tea.taste: Its taste is described as a floral, fruity with a thick mouthfeel.Known for its light 'grassy' taste.

tea.name: Darjeeling
tea.taste: Known as the champagne of teas, it has a musky sweet flavor couples with citrus,mossy, and fruity flavors.
tea.benefits: Reduces risk of cancer, weight loss, antioxidants, stress reliever

tea.name: Green Tea
tea.taste: Its taste can include: sweet, bittersweet,nutty,fruity or even oceanic. It's taste has a wide range and usually depends on the way the leaves are prepared.
tea.benefits: Improves brain function, cardiovascular health, burning of fat, and antioxidants

tea.name: White Tea
tea.taste: Mellow and light flavor, often paired with floral and fruity tones
tea.benefits: Bone Strength, cancer prevention, anti-aging, antioxidant
